content.webTitle: Careers advice for a fitness instructor

fields.headline: What else can a fitness instructor do?
fields.bodyText: 1 Dan could work for a school for children with disabilities, helping them meet the government proposals for pupils to participate in five hours sport a week. As a school sports coordinator he would work across the borough with other agencies. He could earn from 28,172. 2 Using his Football Association Level 3 coaching qualification, Dan could become a community sports coach employed by a councils sports development team and delivering football programmes for a range of age groups. The role gives him the opportunity to specialise in a single sport. He could go on to complete more specific coaching qualifications, widening his career options. He would earn around 18,849. 3 As a sport and activity development officer for a local authority, Dan would be the link between the council and clubs and sports coaches. The role gives him responsibility for developing partnerships with school sports coordinators, as well as national sports governing bodies. It is a job with wide responsibilities. His degree and three years experience as a qualified fitness instructor are advantages. The salary is between 21,412 and 22,845. 4 If Dan is cautious about moving to the public sector he might consider working part-time as an exercise therapist for a mental health trust, developing fitness programmes for people with mental health problems. His experience and Level 3 gym and exercise instructor qualification give him an advantage. He would be expected to work from different trust sites, so the job would offer variety as well as the professional satisfaction that comes with working with vulnerable clients. He would earn between 21,171 and 24,981. 5 The charity the YMCA is a possibility for Dan. He could help coordinate its health and wellbeing GP referral programme, earning 19,500. He has a fitness industry GP referral qualification and has worked with clients at the gym who have come through the programme, so he has a practical understanding of the scheme which would help him in his new role.
